title: Spacious 2 Bed +den in Avondale
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Spacious 2 bed +den, vintage apartment unit in a brick, two flat in Avondale.
Apartment has hardwood floors throughout, it's own private balcony and plenty of closet space.
Living room has a separate den area with a faux brick fireplace; both bedrooms easily fit a queen size bed; and the dining room windows have an extended trim that mimics a bench.
There is laundry on site, permit parking, blue line is ~half a mile (12 minute walk or so), and there is easy access to 90/94 (also about a half mile).
Grocery stores and Milwaukee Ave restaurants are about a two block walk.
Pictures posted are from previous tenantsfrom April.
Unit is being painted and fixtures are being updated.
All persons over the age of 18 must submit application and consent to background check.
Owner pays for water and garbage.
Tenant is responsible for gas, electric, and cable/internet.
